name: part_008
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】猫又おかゆ 2nd Live ＂ぺるそにゃ～りすぺくと＂ 【 #おかゆセカンド 】 [NM7_uUOAOlI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Nekomata Okayu performs the song "Hoshizuki no Neko".
Nekomata Okayu talks to the audience in an MC segment.

subtitles.original: ネコ、ネコ、星月夜のネコ 君はヒト
subtitles.english: Cat, cat, cat of the starry night, you are human.

subtitles.original: ヒト、星月夜のヒト あれはUFO
subtitles.english: Human, human of the starry night, that is a UFO.

subtitles.original: UFO、星月夜のUFO 君はネコ
subtitles.english: UFO, UFO of the starry night, you are a cat.

subtitles.original: ネコ、ネコ、星月夜のネコ 君はヒト
subtitles.english: Cat, cat, cat of the starry night, you are human.

subtitles.original: ヒト、星月夜のヒト あれはUFO
subtitles.english: Human, human of the starry night, that is a UFO.

subtitles.original: UFO、星月夜のUFO 君はネコ
subtitles.english: UFO, UFO of the starry night, you are a cat.

subtitles.original: ネコ、ネコ、星月夜のネコ 君はヒト
subtitles.english: Cat, cat, cat of the starry night, you are human.

subtitles.original: ヒト、星月夜のヒト あれはUFO
subtitles.english: Human, human of the starry night, that is a UFO.

subtitles.original: UFO、星月夜のUFO 君は誰
subtitles.english: UFO, UFO of the starry night, who are you?

subtitles.original: 誰、特別なヒト
subtitles.english: Who? A special person.

subtitles.original: 猫被りの 猫被りの ちょっと臆病な君がすき
subtitles.english: Feigning innocence, playing the cat, I like you, who's a little bit cowardly.

subtitles.original: 君も僕も 同じ名もない世界で
subtitles.english: Both you and I, in the same nameless world,

subtitles.original: やっと見つけた居場所だから
subtitles.english: it's the place I've finally found.

subtitles.original: 猫被りの 猫被りの
subtitles.english: Feigning innocence, playing the cat,

subtitles.original: 取り繕ってる僕が好き
subtitles.english: I like myself, patching things up.

subtitles.original: 君も僕も どこか似てる世界で
subtitles.english: Both you and I, in worlds that are somewhat similar,

subtitles.original: 明日もまた会えたらいいな
subtitles.english: I hope we can meet again tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 猫被りの 猫被りの
subtitles.english: Feigning innocence, playing the cat,

subtitles.original: 猫被りの 猫被りの
subtitles.english: Feigning innocence, playing the cat,

subtitles.original: よそ見してる君が好きだよ
subtitles.english: I like you, looking away.

subtitles.original: 3回目のもぐもぐ！
subtitles.english: The third "Mogu Mogu"!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！もうさ、3回ももぐもぐおかゆって言っちゃったよ
subtitles.english: Yay! I've already said "Mogu Mogu Okayu" three times now.

subtitles.original: このね、ライブの空気感でみんな僕が変なこと言ってもイェーイって言ってくれるからね
subtitles.english: In this live atmosphere, even if I say something weird, everyone says "Yay!"

subtitles.original: これですよ！ということでね、やっとこの日が来ました、横浜！
subtitles.english: This is it! So, the day has finally come, Yokohama!

subtitles.original: お邪魔しております
subtitles.english: Thank you for having me.

subtitles.original: いやー、もうさ、あっという間すぎたんだよこの時間まで
subtitles.english: Man, time has just flown by until now.

subtitles.original: さっきまで僕お弁当食べてたんだけど
subtitles.english: I was eating a lunch box until just a moment ago.

subtitles.original: で、食べるでしょ、お弁当
subtitles.english: And you know, you gotta eat your lunch box.

subtitles.original: 僕の食べたお弁当は何お弁当でしょうか？
subtitles.english: What kind of lunch box do you think I ate?

subtitles.original: うん、なんて言ってるかよくわかんないけど
subtitles.english: Yeah, I can't really tell what you're saying, but...

subtitles.original: え、ちなみにさ、「おにぎり屋だよ」って人手挙げて！
subtitles.english: By the way, raise your hand if you're an "Onigiri-ya"!

subtitles.original: あー！最高最高！見えてるよありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Ah! Great, great! I can see you, thank you!

subtitles.original: ヤッホー！もちろんね、アリーナ席の
subtitles.english: Yahoo! Of course,

subtitles.original: 配信チケットを見てるみんなも見えてるからね！
subtitles.english: I can see everyone watching with streaming tickets, too!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ということでですね、皆さんなんとお気づきだと思いますが、
subtitles.english: So, as I'm sure you've all noticed,

subtitles.original: 本日のバンドは生演奏となっております！
subtitles.english: today's band is a live performance!

subtitles.original: すごーい！
subtitles.english: Amazing!

subtitles.original: やっぱね、生演奏、お腹に来るよね、お腹に
subtitles.english: As expected, a live performance really hits you in the stomach.

subtitles.original: うわー来る、お腹に来るぞー！
subtitles.english: Whoa, it's hitting! It's hitting my stomach!

subtitles.original: 僕のさっき食べたお弁当も多分フッフッてなってるわ
subtitles.english: The lunch box I ate earlier is probably going "thump thump" inside me.

subtitles.original: えー、あとですね、残念なお知らせがございます
subtitles.english: Um, also, I have some sad news.

subtitles.original: あ、これ定番だよね、もう一回やりたい、もう一回やりたい
subtitles.english: Ah, this is a classic response, isn't it? I want to do it again, I want to do it again.

subtitles.original: いくよ、ここで残念なお知らせがあります！
subtitles.english: Here I go: I have some sad news!

subtitles.original: なんと、冒頭無料チラ見せはここで終了です！
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, the free sneak peek at the beginning ends here!
